QueryResult.text: SELECT L.LANGUAGE_CODE, J.ID, J.JOB_DEFINITION_ID, J.NAME, J.START_DATE, J.END_DATE, J.SCHEDULE_DATE, J.MINUTES, J.HOURS, J.MONTHS, J.DAYS_OF_MONTH, J.DAYS_OF_WEEK, J.PRIORITY, L.NAME, J.RECURRENCE_TYPE, J.CREATED_DATE, J.CREATED_BY, J.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, J.LAST_UPDATED_BY FROM CMN_SCH_JOBS J, CMN_LOOKUPS_V L WHERE J.STATUS_CODE = L.LOOKUP_CODE AND L.LOOKUP_TYPE = 'SCH_JOB_STATUS'
